info.name: TP-IS1 - Product System
info.description: Collection generated based on OrderRestController.java and related DTOs.

item.name: Orders

request.description: Retrieves all orders in the system.
Retrieves only orders with CONFIRMED status.
Retrieves orders for the currently authenticated user.
Retrieves orders where all menu items are currently in stock.
Retrieves a specific order by its ID.
Creates a new order. Requires a list of details (products or combos).
Updates an order. Currently supports updating totalPrice via OrderUpdateDTO.
Moves order status to IN_PREPARATION. Requires EstimatedDeliveryTimeDTO.
Marks an order as READY for pickup.
Marks an order as COMPLETE after pickup.
Cancels an order if it hasn't started preparation.
Hard deletes an order.
Retrieves all possible order statuses.
Retrieves orders filtered by a specific state ID.

item.description: The **Orders API** allows managing the lifecycle of orders, from creation to pickup/cancellation.

item.name: Order Details

variable.description: ID of the order to fetch details for

request.description: Retrieves all order details associated with a specific Order ID.

variable.description: ID of the order detail to update

request.description: Updates specific fields of an order detail (quantity, price, or discount).

variable.description: ID of the order detail to delete

request.description: Deletes a specific order detail by its ID.

item.description: The **Order Details API** manages individual line items within an order. It allows retrieving details for a specific order, updating quantities or prices, and removing items from an order.

item.name: Promotions

request.description: Retrieves a list of all promotions.
Retrieves only currently active promotions.
Retrieves details of a specific promotion.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "percentage",
    "name": "Black Friday Deal",
    "description": "50% off on electronics",
    "active": true,
    "productIds": [1, 2],
    "comboIds": [],
    "validDays": ["FRIDAY"],
    "percentage": 50.0
}

request.description: Creates a Percentage Discount Promotion.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "threshold",
    "name": "Big Spender Discount",
    "description": "Save $20 on orders over $100",
    "active": true,
    "productIds": [],
    "comboIds": [],
    "validDays": ["SATURDAY", "SUNDAY"],
    "threshold": 100.00,
    "discountAmount": 20.00
}

request.description: Creates a Threshold Discount Promotion.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "buyxpayy",
    "name": "3 for 2 on Shirts",
    "description": "Buy 3 shirts, pay for 2",
    "active": true,
    "productIds": [5, 6],
    "comboIds": [],
    "validDays": ["MONDAY", "WEDNESDAY", "FRIDAY"],
    "buyQuantity": 3,
    "payQuantity": 2
}

request.description: Creates a Buy X Pay Y Promotion.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "buygivefree",
    "name": "Free Cap with Shoes",
    "description": "Buy a pair of shoes, get a free cap",
    "active": true,
    "productIds": [10],
    "comboIds": [],
    "validDays": [],
    "freeProductIds": [15],
    "freeComboIds": [],
    "oneFreePerTrigger": true
}

request.description: Creates a Buy Give Free Promotion.
Updates a Percentage Promotion. Note: 'type' is required.
Updates a Threshold Promotion. Note: 'type' is required.
Updates a Buy X Pay Y Promotion. Note: 'type' is required.
Updates a Buy Give Free Promotion. Note: 'type' is required.
Toggles the active status of a promotion.
Deletes a promotion by its ID.

item.description: The **Promotions API** allows managing different types of discounts and offers.

item.name: Ingredients

request.description: Retrieves a list of all ingredients in the system.
Retrieves specific details of an ingredient by its ID.
Creates a new ingredient. Requires name, description, and initial stock.
Updates an ingredient's name or description.

query.description: Amount to add to current stock

request.description: Increases the stock of a specific ingredient by the given amount.
Deletes an ingredient. Note: It may fail if the ingredient is associated with products.

item.description: The **Ingredients API** manages the inventory of raw materials used to create products.

item.name: Payments

variable.description: ID of the order to pay

request.description: Processes a payment for a specific order using a Credit Card simulation.

variable.description: ID of the order to pay

request.description: Processes a payment for a specific order using Cash simulation.

variable.description: ID of the order to pay

request.description: Processes a payment for a specific order using QR Code simulation.

item.description: The **Payments API** handles the payment processing for orders using different strategies (Credit, Cash, QR).

item.name: Products

request.description: Retrieves a list of all products in the system.

item.name: Get Products with Ingredients in Stock

request.description: Retrieves only products for which all required ingredients are currently in stock.
Retrieves specific details of a product by its ID.
Creates a new product. Uses `multipart/form-data` to handle both the JSON data (`product`) and an image file (`image`).
Updates an existing product. Also uses `multipart/form-data` to update fields and/or the image.
Deletes a product by its ID.

item.description: The **Products API** allows managing the catalog of items available for order, including their ingredients, tags, and menu sections.

item.name: Combos

request.description: Retrieves a list of all combos in the system.

item.name: Get Combos with Products in Stock

request.description: Retrieves only combos for which all required products (and their ingredients) are currently in stock.
Retrieves specific details of a combo by its ID.
Creates a new combo. Uses `multipart/form-data` to handle both the JSON data (`combo`) and an image file (`image`).
Updates an existing combo. Also uses `multipart/form-data` to update fields and/or the image.
Deletes a combo by its ID.

item.description: The **Combos API** allows managing bundles of products offered as single items.

item.name: Tags

request.description: Retrieves a list of all tags available in the system.
Retrieves details of a specific tag by its ID.
Creates a new tag. The body requires a 'tag' string.
Updates an existing tag's name.
Deletes a tag. Note: This will remove the tag association from any products or combos that use it before deleting the tag itself.

item.description: The **Tags API** allows managing labels (like 'Vegan', 'Gluten-Free') that can be attached to Products and Combos.

item.name: Menu Sections

request.description: Retrieves the full list of menu sections for public display.
Retrieves all menu sections for management purposes.
Retrieves a specific menu section by its ID.
Creates a new menu section (e.g., 'Starters', 'Main Course').
Updates the label or description of a menu section.
Associates existing products with a menu section.
Associates existing combos with a menu section.
Deletes a menu section by its ID.

item.description: The **Menu Sections API** allows organizing products and combos into categories (e.g., 'Breakfast', 'Lunch') for the menu display.

request.description: Logs in a user and returns Access Token and Refresh Token.
Refreshes the session using a valid refresh token.

item.name: Users

request.description: Registers a new user. Requires multipart/form-data. 'user' is a JSON string and 'photo' is an optional file.
Verifies the user account using the code sent by email.
Direct user creation (usually for admins). Bypasses email verification flow.
Updates the role of a user.
Returns the total number of registered users.
Initiates password reset by sending a code to the email.
Resets the password using the verification code.

item.description: API for user management, registration, and password recovery.
